title: Yokoshima Innocent Days
original_name: よこしまイノセントデイズ
sinopse:
"I have to protect him."

Yuki is overprotective of his friend Natsuki, who remains childlike even as his body grows. Will Natsuki, who follows Yuki around like a dog, finally be able to become independent...?!

(Source: Shinshokan, translated)
